price: Bãbu kõme a gare ka game da al'amarin (shiryar da su banda iyar da manzanci). Ko Allah Ya karɓi tũbarsu, kõ kuwa Ya yimusu azãba, to lalle ne sũ, mãsu zãlunci ne.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laysa laka mina al-amri shayon aw yatūba ʿalayhim aw yuʿadhibahum fa-innahum ẓālimūna
